‚Äúpradeshiya sabhawe siduwi athayi kiyana wat badu wanchawa sambandhayen parikshanayak pawathwima sandaha aparadha parikshanadeparthamenthuwata bara denawa‚Äù yayi sabhapathi ee.di. kumarasiri mahatha pawasiya.pradeshiya sabha manthri sampath chaminda jayasinha mahatha (e.ja.ni.sa) sabhawe siduwi athi wat badu wanchawata sambandha ayata wiruddhawa katayuthu karanne da?yi mewara masika maha sabhawe di mathukala prashnayakata pilithuru demin sabhapathi waraya ese pawasiya.homagama pradeshiya sabhawasabhapathi ee.di. kumarasiri mahathage pradhanathwayen raswima pawathwini.sunil perumbuli mahatha (e.ja.ni.sa)- wat badu wanchawa gana komasarista pamanak danwa wadak naha.
